title: You Were Made For Me
description: The day I created a boy started out like any other.Katie didn't mean to create a boy. A boy like a long-lost Hemsworth brother: six-foot tall with floppy hair and eyes like the sky on a clear summer's day; whose lips taste like cookie-dough and whose skin smells like springtime.A boy who is completely devoted to Katie.He was meant to be perfect.But he was never meant to exist.
author: Jenna Guillaume
